DADOS-GERAIS.NOME-COMPLETO: Paulo Cezar Vidal Carneiro de Albuquerque
DADOS-GERAIS.NOME-EM-CITACOES-BIBLIOGRAFICAS: ALBUQUERQUE, P. C. V. C.;Paulo Cezar Vidal Carneiro de Albuquerque;Albuquerque Paulo Cezar Vidal Carneiro;ALBUQUERQUE, PAULO CEZAR VIDAL CARNEIRO DE;P.C.V.C.ALBUQUERQUE;DE ALBUQUERQUE, P. C. V. C.

RESUMO-CV.TEXTO-RESUMO-CV-RH: Professor Doutor em Traumatologia da Universidade Federal de Pernambuco. Possui graduação em Medicina pela Universidade Federal de Pernambuco (1985), mestrado em Cirurgia pela Universidade Federal de Pernambuco (1995) e doutorado em Cirurgia pela Universidade Federal de Pernambuco (2011). Tem experiência na área de Medicina, com ênfase em Cirurgia Ortopédica, atuando principalmente nos seguintes temas: método ilizarov, método de ilizarov, cirurgia do joelho, ortopedia e aparelho de ilizarov.
RESUMO-CV.TEXTO-RESUMO-CV-RH-EN:
Doutor Ortopaedic Professor of Federal University of Pernambuco. Graduated in Medicine from the Federal University of Pernambuco (1985), graduate in knee surgery and sports medicine by the Università Degli Studi Pavia - Italy graduate in reconstructive surgery and treatment of members of orthopedic deformities with the Ilizarov method, the Ospedale Lecco (Italy) Masters in Surgery, Federal University of Pernambuco (1995), Doctor of Surgery, Federal University of Pernambuco (2011), Medical Expert gazetted the Court of Pernambuco (TJPE), expert and partner by the Brazilian and Italian Traumatology and Orthopedics, Medical specialist Skills Skills Brazilian Society of Medical and Legal Medicine, Assistant Professor of Traumatology, Department of Surgery, Federal University of Pernambuco (UFPE), specialist in Hip and Knee Surgery, specialist Ilizarov method for ASAMI Brazil and Italian.
Areas of expertise in Orthopedics and Traumatology: Surgery of the Hip and Knee, reconstructive surgeries and treatment of bone infections by the Ilizarov method.
Areas of Practice Skills in Medical: Official Expert of the Court of Pernambuco acting in Civil Courts and Private Occupational Accident, Official Expert indicated several sticks in the Labour Court and the 6th Region Federal Court 6th region in Pernambuco.
